import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";// Material Dashboard 2 React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var cardMedia={styleOverrides:{root:{borderRadius:borderRadius.xl,margin:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," ").concat(pxToRem(16)," 0")},media:{width:"auto"}}};export default cardMedia;
